method.name: Condensed Fuzzy K-Nearest Neighbors classifier

reference.ref: J.-H. Zhai, N. Li, and M.-Y. Zhai, The condensed fuzzy k-nearest neighbor rule based on sample fuzzy entropy, in Proceedings of the 2011 International Conference on Machine Learning and Cybernetics (ICMLC'11), Guilin, China, July 10-13, 2011, pp. 282-286.

generalDescription.howWork: CFKNN is a preprocessing method for FuzzyKNN inspired in the classic Hart's condensing rule - the CNN algorithm. Before the application of FuzzyKNN to classify new instances, instances for the training set are removed depending on an entropy measure which determines whether they are removed or kept.

parameterSpec.param: K Value: K parameter in the k-NN voting rule.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: CFKNN-C Dataset: appendicitis Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: Default settings
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the Vis-Clas-Check results' file the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.6363636363636364 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.9 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.17727272727272728 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.10311271214044698 Correctly classified: 0.8227272727272728 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Summary of data, Classifiers: appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8210526315789474 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.8210526315789474 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8421052631578947 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.8421052631578947 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.8210526315789474 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.8315789473684211 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.8333333333333334 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.8541666666666666 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.8333333333333334 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.8125 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.1687719298245614 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.011971434786457767 Correctly classified: 0.8312280701754386 Global N/C: 0.0
